name: Valentine's Day Celebration
description: PARENTS: Please make sure to bring 1 Valentine's card for all 22 friends in the class and leave the 'To' section of the card blank. Our bags were unexpectedly on the smaller side this year, so please keep the goodies and prizes small this year!

name: Father/Daughter Dance
description: Denim and Diamonds dance theme. Tickets $20 per guest, bought in advance on the PTA website. Light snacks and refreshments provided. For Los Alamitos students only.

name: Mother/Son Dance
description: Denim and Diamonds dance theme. Tickets $20 per guest, bought in advance on the PTA website. Light snacks and refreshments provided. For Los Alamitos students only.

name: Wear PJs to school!
description: PARENTS: Please ensure your child wears school-appropriate pajamas to school.

name: Wear a sports-themed shirt Spirit Day
description: PARENTS: Send child in sports-themed shirt

name: Label New Items
description: PARENTS: Over the holidays, the kids have definitely grown! Many of them came to school with new sweaters, clothes, and jackets! Please make sure to label these new items with their name for easier reunification! Many kids have been coming to school this week with gloves! Please make sure they can identify them if they brought them! I currently have two sets at school and no one knows who they belong to!

name: Galentine's Night Out
description: 45 minutes of strength training workout at F45 Branham Park followed by bubbles. Free event with a maximum of 30 people, sign up by texting "LAMOMS" to 408.549.7760.

name: Family Fun Night - Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA.

name: Yearbook Cover Contest
description: 5th grade students can enter drawings with the theme "Under the Sea" to be displayed on the yearbook cover. Entries due by February 23, 2026.

name: Variety Show
description: Volunteers needed for stage hands and concession organizer. Audition videos due by March 1st, 2026. Dress rehearsal on March 19th, 2026 at 4:00 PM. Show on March 20th, 2026 at 4:00 PM.

name: Reading Lab Volunteers Needed
description: Volunteers needed once per week (Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday) to tutor students in the Reading Lab program. Training provided.

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025-26 yearbook. 5th grade parents need to submit baby photos by March 1st.

name: Middle School Selection Process
description: 5th grade families need to submit school choice requests online through the Parent Portal from January 20 to February 13, 2026.

name: Holiday Book Exchange
description: PARENTS: This week in the white envelope, you should have received a flyer about our Holiday Book Exchange we will have on 12/19 after our holiday party! Please make sure to bring in a new or gently used wrapped book (gender neutral if possible and secular) by 12/17 to share the joy of reading with their classmates!
